channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: More than 100 homes damaged by tornado near Houston
item.description: More than 100 homes were damaged after a tornado touched down in a residential area outside Houston. Authorities said Monday that no injuries were reported.
item.content:encoded:
More than 100 homes were damaged after a tornado touched down in a residential area outside Houston. Authorities said Monday that no injuries were reported.

(Image credit: Brett Coomer/Houston Chronicle)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Portland Trail Blazers coach pleads not guilty in rigged poker games case
item.description: Hall of Famer Chauncey Billups has pleaded not guilty to charges he profited from rigged poker games involving several Mafia figures and another former NBA player.
item.content:encoded:
Hall of Famer Chauncey Billups has pleaded not guilty to charges he profited from rigged poker games involving several Mafia figures and another former NBA player.

(Image credit: Yuki Iwamura)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: New poll shows Latino support for Trump is slipping after gains in 2024
item.description: The Pew Research Center's survey of Latinos show majorities disapprove of the president, especially his policies on the economy and immigration.
item.content:encoded:
The Pew Research Center's survey of Latinos show majorities disapprove of the president, especially his policies on the economy and immigration.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Trump and China's leader Xi Jinping hold a call and discuss trade, Taiwan and Ukraine
item.description: Monday's call was the latest in a flurry of diplomatic and trade parries between the U.S. and China over tariffs and technology export restrictions.
item.content:encoded:
Monday's call was the latest in a flurry of diplomatic and trade parries between the U.S. and China over tariffs and technology export restrictions.

(Image credit: Andrew Caballero-Reynolds)
item.dc:creator: Emily Feng

item.title: Pentagon investigates Democratic senator for telling troops to refuse 'illegal orders'
item.description: The Pentagon says it's opening an investigation into Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly in the wake of a video of Democratic lawmakers urging servicemembers not to comply with "illegal orders."
item.content:encoded:
The Pentagon says it's opening an investigation into Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly in the wake of a video of Democratic lawmakers urging servicemembers not to comply with "illegal orders."

(Image credit: Drew Angerer)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: 'Just Google' me: Slender Man stabber is recaptured after fleeing her group home
item.description: Geyser and a friend lured a classmate to the woods and stabbed her 19 times in 2014. She moved from a psychiatric facility to a group home in Wisconsin earlier this year.
item.content:encoded:
Geyser and a friend lured a classmate to the woods and stabbed her 19 times in 2014. She moved from a psychiatric facility to a group home in Wisconsin earlier this year.

(Image credit: Morry Gash)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Judge tosses Comey, James cases after finding prosecutor unlawfully appointed
item.description: The judge's decision on the appointment of Lindsey Halligan marks a significant setback to efforts to go after the president's perceived political enemies.
item.content:encoded:
The judge's decision on the appointment of Lindsey Halligan marks a significant setback to efforts to go after the president's perceived political enemies.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: Reggae pioneer Jimmy Cliff dies at 81
item.description: The musician and actor helped propel reggae into the international spotlight, thanks in part to his songs and starring role in the 1972 film The Harder They Come.
item.content:encoded:
The musician and actor helped propel reggae into the international spotlight, thanks in part to his songs and starring role in the 1972 film The Harder They Come.

(Image credit: Fabrice Coffrini)
item.dc:creator: Isabella Gomez Sarmiento

item.title: SEVENTEEN: Tiny Desk Concert
item.description: The very first K-pop band to play behind the Tiny Desk gives us a decade-long, catalog-spanning medley.
item.content:encoded: The very first K-pop band to play behind the Tiny Desk gives us a decade-long, catalog-spanning medley.
item.dc:creator: Suraya Mohamed

item.title: Ken Pomeroy on her latest album, 'Cruel Joke'
item.description: The Oklahoma City singer-songwriter's tunes will break your heart, then mend it.
item.content:encoded: The Oklahoma City singer-songwriter's tunes will break your heart, then mend it.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Kallao
